Name: Fists
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Knuckles
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Karambit
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Bayonet
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Huntsman
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Bowie
Countering: Early game combat, but watch out for people who spam click with it.

Name: Wood Axe
Countering: Simillar Countering for the Knives and Fists, be more careful since it has extra damage and range, and fast clicking.

Name: Fire Axe
Countering: Same Countering for the Wood Axe, but more careful since it has extremely high damage and fast clicking.

Name: Hook
Countering: Same Countering for the Knives and Fists, but don't get in its way since it is automatic and you'll most likely get damaged.

Name: Pan
Special features: Appears on your back when not equipped. Unequipped Pan reflects bullets.
Countering: Similar Countering for the Wood and Fire Axe, but try to avoid being in front of it as it has the highest damage of all the melees. Attack only when the player faces the Pan away you.

Name: Katana
Special features: Armor Piercing (Can Break Ammo Crates), Cleave effect
Countering: Similar Countering for the Wood and Fire Axe, but try to avoid being in front of it and keep extra range as it has the high damage and range.

Name: Naginata
Special features: Armor Piercing (Can Break Ammo Crates), Cleave effect
Countering: Similar Countering for the Katana, but try to avoid being in front of it and keep extra range as it has the high damage and range.

Name: Stone Hammer
Special features: Armor Piercing and Stone Piercing (can break Ammo Crates and Stone-plated Obstacles)
Countering: Keep your range, as it has extremely high damage. Or make sure you have a good amount of adrenaline since the hitbox is very small.

Name: War Hammer
Special features: Armor Piercing and Stone Piercing (can break Ammo Crates and Stone-plated Obstacles)
Countering: Similar countering to the Naginata, since it's identical but more damage.

Name: Machete
Countering: Keep your range, as it has high damage and fast CPS.

Name: Kukri
Countering: The same as the Machete.

Name: Bonesaw
Countering: Keep your range to avoid it from hitting you. And don't even think about getting close, since it has fast CPS and good damage.

Name: Crowbar
Countering: Keep your range to avoid it from hitting you.

Name: Spade
Countering: Keep your range to avoid it from hitting you. Or counter it with adrenaline, since the CPS is slower compare to other melee.

Name: Ice Pick
Countering: Keep your range to avoid it from hitting you.

Name: Lasr Swrd
Special features: Cleave Effect, Armor Piercing, Swings can deflect bullets.
Countering: Keep your range to avoid it from hitting you. Use a fully automatic weapon.

Name: Frag Grenade
Countering: Keep your range, as it will most likely one hit kill you if you don't have max armor.

Name: Heart Frag
Countering: Keep your range, as it will most likely one hit kill you if you don't have max armor.

Name: Smoke Grenade
Special features: Gives visual cover. Reduces vision to 1x.
Countering: Don't go in it. Or get in and wait the enemy to come, making a suprise attack (although this can be a disavantage if the enemy have a good scope and have a high damage weapon, checking the smoke if there's anyone, but this can also be a bait)

Name: MIRV Grenade
Special features: Grenade splits into 6 smaller grenades that explode after the first explosion
Countering: Keep your range, as it will most likely one hit kill you if you don't have good or max armor, keep away when it explodes, as smaller grenades will also form.

Name: Snowball
Special features: When hit drops a random item from your inventory
Countering: Move around to avoid it hitting you.

Name: Potato
Special features: When hit drops a random item from your inventory
Countering: Move around to avoid it hitting you.

Name: Strobe
Special features: Summons in an airstrike where it's thrown, in the direction thrown.
Countering: Run away immediately when you see one throwing it.

Name: Mine
Special features: Lands on ground and arms in 5 seconds. Approaching triggers explosion after it is armed. Expires after ??? seconds.
Countering: Keep your range, as it will most likely one hit kill you if you don't have max armor. and you can also see the landmine, so quickly go on it and go away, or shoot on it (will trigger as well)

Name: M9
Countering: Almost every gun can counter it, however don’t get in close with someone who has dual M9s.

Name: M93R
Countering: Lethal at close range when dual wielded, stay at mid range and you should be fine.

Name: P30L
Special features: No speed effect (Speed will still be 1)
Countering: Try to stay at mid range and strafe to avoid being hit. When dual wielded this is very deadly, so take the enemy out as fast as possible.

Name: MP5
Countering: This weapon excels at mid range, so try to get in close and circle them or stay at a farther range and take them out.

Name: G18C
Countering: Stay at a mid range and you can incapacitate them easily. Dual glocks at very close range is a death sentence.

Name: MAC-10
Countering: Stay at mid range and most of the shots will miss. Avoid getting in close as this is deadly at close range.

Name: UMP9
Countering: Get in close as this is a burst weapon and you can probably outgun your opponent.

Name: Vector (9mm)
Countering: Circle the opponent as the fast fire rate will not be effective.

Name: CZ-3A1
Countering: Stay at mid to long range because this weapon will shred you up close.

Name: VSS
Countering: Get in close with a fast firing weapon or take pot shots at them from behind cover.

Name: M870
Countering: Deadly weapon in closed spaces at close ranges. Keep a mid distance and you should be able to dodge the pellets.

Name: MP220
Countering: Stay at mid ranges and you should be fine.

Name: Saiga-12
Countering: Since this has a lower range than most shotguns, you can get in a little closer and kill the enemy quickly.

Name: SPAS-12
Countering: This shotgun has a surprising range. Stay at longer ranges to take advantage of bullet drop off and pick them off with a rifle.

Name: USAS-12
Countering: Keep your range, DO NOT go in range unless ABSOLUTELY necessary. Fighting inside a bunker is better sice the enemy can get self-damaged and bullet reflects.

Name: M1100
Special features: Wider spread. When you hit shots feathers come out (Thanksgiving only).
Countering: This shotgun is very deadly at close range, so stay at a mid range since it’s accuracy is poor and you will most likely kill them while taking little damage.

Name: Super 90
Special features: Uses precision slug rounds that appear to be 1 bullet. First-Shot Accuracy
Countering: Use in mid to long range. Unlike most shotguns, this can substitute a sniper. Also hiding won't work due to very fast reloading.

Name: Hawk 12G
Special features: Uses Buckshot like the M870. Tighter grouping.
Countering: The gun is lethal at destroying structures/objects so hiding won't work. Best option is get high adrenaline and dodge bullets.

Name: Lasr Gun
Special features: Fires laser shots that can reflect off any obstacle.
Countering: Best option is get high adrenaline and dodge bullets.

Name: OT-38
Countering: You can outgun your opponent with a fast weapon, however this gun does a lot of damage when dual wielded if most of the shots hit so take them out quickly.

Name: AK-47
Countering: This gun is less accurate at long range so find a more accurate gun and take them out.

Name: M39 EMR
Countering: Since this is a semi automatic rifle you can rush them with an automatic weapon and most likely kill them.

Name: DP-28
Countering: Stay at mid to long range and shoot them with a rifle as more of your shots will hit than theirs.

Name: Mosin-Nagant
Countering: Deadly in the hands of an expert marksman, get in close and gun them down before they hit you too many times.

Name: SCAR-H
Countering: Take advantage of the lower ammo capacity and rush them with a faster firing weapon.

Name: SV-98
Countering: Essentially a better mosin nagant, either outgun them at close range or throw smoke grenades and advance on them that way.

Name: PKP Pecheneg
Countering: Somewhat accurate LMG, stay at longer ranges and take them out with a more accurate weapon.

Name: BAR M1918
Countering: Attack when they reload, or shoot them with a higher DPS weapon.

Name: M1 Garand
Countering: Wait until they emptied the gun, then rush them while they reload. But don’t get too close.

Name: OTs-38
Countering: An upgraded version of the normal OT-38, they will most likely be dual wielding this, so take them out before you are hit too many times.

Name: Groza
Countering: Out-DPS then at mid range, as this is lethal at close range.

Name: Groza-S
Countering: Harder to see bullets, do the same as you would a normal Groza.

Name: AN-94
Countering: Rush to the shooter in a zigzag running style to dodge the bullets. When you reach him use a Melee or a high DPS Weapon. But can be lethal if enemy cause a chain reaction, making you die easily.

Name: SVD-63
Countering: Get to long range since the bullet won't last long.

Name: BLR-81
Countering: Very easy to dodge bullets, just rush in with a high DPS weapon.

Name: PKM
Countering: Don't hide, since it's capable to destroy structures/objects, just run with high adrenaline or rush in with a very high DPS gun.

Name: M134
Countering: This gun is very accurate. You can either try and snipe them at long range, out dps at mid range while moving from cover to cover, or rush in at close range and hope that you can easily shoot them due to their slowness.

Name: Water Gun
Countering: Try getting the fight into a Warehouse or Bunker. That way, you can reflect your bullets but your enemy can't.

Name: FAMAS
Countering: Rush them and you will be fine as you can out dps them while their next burst is being prepared.

Name: M416
Countering: Stay at a longer range due to the drop off and inaccuracy this gun suffers at longer ranges.

Name: M4A1-S
Countering: Hard to see bullets, Higher accuracy than the M416, This weapon is deadly at close to mid ranges, so try and keep your distance.

Name: Mk 12 SPR
Countering: Since this is a semi automatic weapon, rush them and you will most likely be fine.

Name: Scout Elite
Countering: Less damaging than other sniper rifles, you can try and quickly eliminate them at mid range or get in close and outgun them.

Name: M249
Countering: Get bug a adrenaline and try to take potshots while moving from cover to cover, this will be easier due to their lower speed.

Name: QBB-97
Countering: Lethal at short ranges, try and out dps them with a rifle at mid range.

Name: L86A2
Countering: Lethal if the enemy have a good scope, spamming at you continously.

Name: DEagle 50
Countering: When used by itself, you can try and attack them at mid range or use an SMG at close range. Extremely deadly when dual wielded, take them out as fast as possible with at mid range if this is the case.

Name: AWM-S
Countering: Use cover to your advantage, do not get hit by this as they will most likely switch to their secondary and kill you if you are hit. Easiest way to counter is to get in close range and dispatch them quickly.

Name: Mk 20 SSR
Countering: Move around, Mk 20's slow velocity makes you very hard to hit. Also EXTREMELY LETHAL at close/mid range.

Name: Flare Gun
Countering: The gun does no damage itself, however if the user fires it then stay away from the incoming air drop so you aren’t crushed.

Name: Model 94
Countering: Get in close and out DPS them. In the hands of a good marksman this weapon can be deadly at long range.

Name: Peacemaker
Countering: Most people fan the hammer with this gun, so stay at mid range and allow most of their shots to miss while you take them out. Much deadlier when dual wielded, stay out of confined areas and keep your distance.

Name: M1A1
Countering: This will shred you at close range, keep a medium distance and take them out.

Name: M1911
Countering: Don’t get in close, mid range will easily be able to take them out.

Name: Vector (.45 ACP)
Countering: Higher dps than the normal vector due to chambering. .45 ACP ammo, keep a distance and strafe often to make most of their shots miss.

Name: M79
Countering: Don’t be inside or near buildings, and constantly keep moving since the shell takes some time to reach you.

Name: Potato Cannon
Special features: Shoots explosive Potatoes that can stun victims and forcefully remove an item
Countering: Move around with high Adrenaline to make sure it won't hit you. Hitting one can resulting in a chain reaction which leads to death. Lethal at close range, but the enemy can also self damage due to explosion.

Name: Spud Gun
Special features: Shoot potato wedges that when hit, expand the opponent.
Countering: Very lethal since this gun can make you have a bigger hitbox, but the thing is everyone can get expanded (including your teamate, yes) so becareful when using it.

Name: M9 Cursed
Special features: Given by the Dev Troll Special Perk. Unlimited ammo. Cannot be dropped.

Name: Bugle
Countering: Kill the Bugler while there's no enemy besides, so no enemy can get buffs and ambush.

Name: Flamethrower
Special features: First gun to have a passive damage effect, making the player take damage for an additional 5 seconds after being hit.
Countering: Phoenix perk or Foam Grenade stop burning
